example.text: Let me get this straight: [[user]] and extremist Republicans want to yell about “fiscal responsibility” while they threaten to default on our national debt. This is dangerous nonsense. It’s time to stop playing political games and pay our nation’s bills. [[url]]
As we begin the new 118th Congress, I am committed to finding bipartisan solutions to the issues affecting the Inland Empire and our communities. That is why I want to hear from you!

I introduced the Enrique Roman-Martinez Military Cold Case Justice Act to change the way the military treats unsolved cases. My legislation would help ensure that military families get the closure and justice they deserve. Learn more here: [[url]]
Votes have been delayed, I wonder if we are waiting for someone to make bail. ?

Let me get this straight: [[user]] and extremist Republicans want to yell about “fiscal responsibility” while they threaten to default on our national debt. This is dangerous nonsense. It’s time to stop playing political games and pay our nation’s bills. [[url]]

I was honored to be invited by the Ahmadiyya Muslim Community to speak with constituents about the importance of human rights and what we are doing in Congress to address critical issues across the globe. Resources Tax season is approaching!

I introduced the Enrique Roman-Martinez Military Cold Case Justice Act to change the way the military treats unsolved cases. My legislation would help ensure that military families get the closure and justice they deserve. Learn more here: [[url]]
